title: Lies That Bind Us
description: HIS DARKNESS IS HER SALVATIONEverything my family led me to believe is a lie. A powerful, beautiful stranger becomes my only truth.Will Hastings.A ruthless Brit with twisted secrets.A man sworn to protect me from a legacy of death.The man I desire above all else.When he finds out an order of assassins has reformed, that they plan to take something from him, he returns to the US and claims what belonged to him all along.The woman he has wanted for ten years.His obsession.Me.Will pursues the men who want to end my life, and I grieve for my losses. I should grieve for my soul because I’ve fallen in love with a merciless killer, but I don’t. There’s nothing more to lose. There is only him.
author: Kelleigh L. Clare
